title: Lag in champion select
body:
Hello community. I have little lag in new champion select and the sound laggy so annoying. When I am in champion select my proccessor is going up to 70-90 %.

Please help me.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: Im going to try "Enable low spec mode" and hope it will work since i got same lag issues in championselect. ill come back and tell u how it worked out for me

Ooooooo yea your processor probably shouldn't be running that hard when you're not even actually in the game yet. Let's try a relatively easy and quick fix by turning on low-spec mode in the client options. If you click on the gear in the upper right of the client, that option will be at the top of the first page the options show. Let me know if that helps ease some of the load your processor is working with!
